column1: Section 343 of the Civil Procedure Code runs as follows:

column2: 343(1)  The  court  may  for  sufficient  cause  stay  execution
(2) The application to court to stay proceedings shall be made
by  petition,  to  which  all  persons  interested  in  the  matter  of
the execution shall be made parties, and no such order shall
be made until after payment of all Fiscalâ€™s fees then due.
